languages.text: "Я бы не стал подвергать сомнению ваш титул, губернатор". {n}Соломон одаривает вас долгим взглядом.{/n} "Да и Вольный Торговец тоже вряд ли желает вас смутить".
"I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."
languages.original_text: "Я бы не стал подвергать сомнению ваш титул, губернатор". {n}Соломон одаривает вас долгим взглядом.{/n} "Да и Вольный Торговец тоже вряд ли желает вас смутить".

traits.locale_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to embarrass you either."
"I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to embarrass you either."
"I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."
"I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."
"I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."
"I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

languages.text: “我绝不会怀疑你的头衔，总督。”{n}索罗蒙意味深长地看了你一眼。{/n}“行商浪人也并不是想让你难堪。”
languages.original_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

traits.locale_text: “我绝不会怀疑你的头衔，总督。”{n}索罗蒙意味深长地看了你一眼。{/n}“行商浪人也并不是想让你难堪。”

languages.text: «Jamás cuestionaría su título, gobernador». {n}Solomorne te mira fijamente.{/n} «Y dudo mucho que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente haya pretendido ofenderle tampoco».
languages.original_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

traits.locale_text: «Jamás cuestionaría su título, gobernador». {n}Solomorne te mira fijamente.{/n} «Y dudo mucho que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente haya pretendido ofenderle tampoco».

languages.text: "Ünvanınızı sorgulamaya asla cüret etmem Vali Bey." {n}Solomorne sana uzun uzun bakıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in de sizi kırmak istemediğinden eminim."
languages.original_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

traits.locale_text: "Ünvanınızı sorgulamaya asla cüret etmem Vali Bey." {n}Solomorne sana uzun uzun bakıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in de sizi kırmak istemediğinden eminim."

languages.text: 「お前の肩書きを疑うことなんて絶対にないよ、総督」{n}ソロモーンは、長い間あなたを見る。{/n}「そして、ローグトレーダーもお前を怒らせたいわけじゃない」
languages.original_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の肩書きを疑うことなんて絶対にないよ、総督」{n}ソロモーンは、長い間あなたを見る。{/n}「そして、ローグトレーダーもお前を怒らせたいわけじゃない」

languages.text: « Jamais je ne mettrais votre titre en doute, gouverneur, {n}affirme Solomorne en vous lançant un regard lourd de sens.{/n} Et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'a aucune intention de vous offenser. »
languages.original_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais je ne mettrais votre titre en doute, gouverneur, {n}affirme Solomorne en vous lançant un regard lourd de sens.{/n} Et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'a aucune intention de vous offenser. »

languages.text: "Ich würde Euren Titel niemals anzweifeln, Gouverneur." {n}Solomorne sieht dich lange an.{/n} "Und auch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} will Euch gewiss nicht beleidigen."
languages.original_text: "I would never question your title, Governor." {n}Solomorne gives you a long look.{/n} "And the Rogue Trader hardly wishes to offend you either."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euren Titel niemals anzweifeln, Gouverneur." {n}Solomorne sieht dich lange an.{/n} "Und auch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} will Euch gewiss nicht beleidigen."
